get.description: Returns a simple welcome message to verify the API is running

get.summary: Check if Weave tracing is enabled (WANDB_API_KEY set)

get.description: Returns health status including Redis availability

get.summary: List all agents for the authenticated user

post.summary: Send a message to an agent

get.summary: List memory blocks for an agent

post.description: Creates a new news search workflow and queues it for background processing. The workflow will search for news articles matching the query within the specified date range, extract location mentions, geocode them, and generate summaries.

201.description: Workflow created and queued for processing

400.description: Invalid input - fromDate must be before toDate

get.description: Returns all news workflows created by the authenticated user, ordered by creation date descending.
Returns the current status and progress of a workflow, including article counts and any errors.

404.description: Workflow not found or not owned by user

get.description: Returns the complete workflow with all processed articles, extracted locations, AI-generated summaries, key points, and sentiment analysis.

200.description: Workflow report with articles and locations

404.description: Workflow not found or not owned by user

get.description: Returns all geocoded locations as a GeoJSON FeatureCollection for map display. Each feature includes the location coordinates, article metadata, and geocoding confidence.

404.description: Workflow not found or not owned by user

post.description: Creates a new news alert for recurring or manual searches

get.summary: Get all alert locations as GeoJSON
get.description: Returns all geocoded locations from active alerts as a GeoJSON FeatureCollection

parameters.name: alertIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated alert IDs to filter by

get.description: Returns alert details with recent articles

delete.description: Delete an alert and all its articles

post.description: Queue the alert for immediate processing
